title: Future of Life's Map
note: The data on this map was directly copied from the Future of Life Institute's [Value Alignment Map](https://futureoflife.org/valuealignmentmap)
cover_root_description: The project of creating value-aligned AI is perhaps one of the most important things we will ever do. However, there are open and often neglected questions regarding what is exactly entailed by 'beneficial AI.' Value alignment is the project of one day creating beneficial AI and has been expanded outside of its usual technical context to reflect and model its truly interdisciplinary nature.
